title: Remove “Find People” from the app header navigation

requirements.text: Remove the navigation item labeled "Find People" from the authenticated app header navigation (both the desktop header button group and the mobile slide-out menu), so it no longer appears in the tab/navigation bar UI.

quotes: remove this section that says find people from the tab bar

acceptanceCriteria: When signed in on desktop widths, the top header navigation no longer shows a button labeled "Find People".
When signed in on mobile widths, the slide-out menu no longer shows an item labeled "Find People".
No other navigation items (Feed, My Profile, Requests, Notifications, Settings) are removed or renamed.
All user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change the User Directory page layout, tabs, search behavior, or follow/unfollow functionality.
Do not remove or change the /directory route itself—only remove the "Find People" navigation entry from the header navigation UI.
